name: Canapes With Piquillo Peppers And Anchovies
keywords: anchovy fillets, french bread, piquillo peppers, appetizer
recipeIngredient: 10 3/4-inch-thick (roughly) slices French or Italian bread, cut in half
10 piquillo peppers, cut in half (or 4 or 5 roasted peppers)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly toast bread. Top each piece with a tiny bit of garlic, then layer with a piece of piquillo and an anchovy. Drizzle with a little olive oil. Serve within one hour.
